Parallels.ab: sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanumąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe [...] zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e [...] tauua ātarš puϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ same sequence in xšnūmaine in Y3.1 + Y3.2, Y3.21 + Y3.22, Y7.22 + Y7.23; similar to Y7.2 + Y7.3.

āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e = Y24.5 ; ~ Y6.19, Y10.21, Y13.7, Y26.4, Y59.23, VrS51.5, VrS81.22, DrYt4.13 zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe iδa aṣ̌aōnō aṣ̌īmca frauuaṣ̌īmca yazamaide; ~ Y68.30, NyMihr1.6, NyXwar1.6 nəmō zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e.
